page.title: 08Home Life
page.content: Home Life For many families most mornings begin when the children get up to go to school although sometimes their parents have already left for work and they may have to get themselves ready, and perhaps get other children ready too.There are plenty of things at home for entertainment, such as television, video machines and computers, but lots of children still prefer to play outside the home when they can. They also enjoy going out with their parents at weekends or playing with their friends. Many are also expected to help with jobs around the house and with shopping. There are often pets at home too.Older children usually have homework to do in the evenings, which means they don't have much free time during the week, as they have to go to bed quite early.
